attributes.additional_details: To reduce battery waste, teen addiction and littering. Please place a ban on all single use vapes ie ones with a puff count and non rechargeable batteries.
attributes.background: SU vapes are terrible for the environment, most of their batteries are rechargeable but don’t have the circuitry to do so. On top of this since the popularisation of geek and elf bars they have become a significant source of litter in cities. They also contribute to teen nicotine addiction.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612333
